summary: With his glory days long gone, an overweight former football player will make a bet with his close friends and visit the nearest gym for the ultimate makeover, only to discover the girl of his dreams and his true soulmate.
cast: Robbie Kaller|Jillian Federman|Tommy Snider|Constance Reese|Jacquelyn Umof|Jess Allen|Bryan Bellomo|Wendy Worthington|Bruno Oliver|Phillipe Simon|Taylor Collins|Jason Duplissea|Kristina Haddad|Christina Fandino|Sylvia Panacione|Tristan James Butler|Eric Marinho|Mark Stender|Rebecca Spicher|Ervin Ross|Ashley Ledbetter|W Blake Sienkiewicz|John Curry|Bruce Ellington|Cuyle Carvin|Edmond Choi|Danielle Argyros|Chris Bonanno|Fawn Bowen|Les Brooks Jr.|Drew Harrington Brown|Donald C. Burr|Michael Camden|Andrew Chen|Alina Chorna|Graham Clarke|Edward Coomber|Allie Costa|Rene Delacruz|Ev Depaolis|Christopher Michael Everett|Matthew Gittelson|Y.J. title: A Big Love Story
